short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME:... (remains largely the same as the original)
description: This amendment to the closing time requirement has the following changes: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by February 2,  2024 at 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. This requirement is for the Canadian Forces Housing Agency (CFHA) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) to provide cost-effective maintenance and minor improvement services for the Crown owned portfolio in accordance with the Annex A Statement of Work. There is an optional teleconference associated with this requirement. The optional teleconference will be held on December 19, 2023 at 13:00 pm EST in English and also December 20, 2023 at 13:00 pm EST in French. Please confirm attendance for one of the two meetings. Offerors must communicate with the Standing Offer Authority no later than December 15, 2023 at 14:00 EST to confirm attendance and provide the name(s) of the person(s) who will attend.

full_summary:
### [W3701-24-BA03 - Responsive Maintenance Services](#W3701-24-BA03)
[Solicitation Number: WS4210977194](#ws4210977194)

**Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) invites qualified bidders to submit a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for Responsive Maintenance Services for the Crown owned portfolio.

**Key Details**

* **Solicitation:***[WS4210977194](#ws4210977194)
* **RFSO Title:** W3701-24-BA03 - Responsive Maintenance Services - CFHA - Bagotville
* **Publication Date:** December 4, 2023
* **Closing Date:** February 2, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2026
* **Goods and Services Classification (GSC) Codes:** None
* **UNSPSC codes:** 72102902 - Landscaping services
* **Trade Agreements:** This RFSO applies to the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement among others.

**Notice and Reference**

This notice and all associated documentation can be accessed on the Government of Canada's purchasing platform, [CanadaBuys](http://www.canadabuys.gc.ca) under the reference number [WS4210977194](#ws4210977194). Bidders must submit their proposal through [Ariba Discovery](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18183074?extsite=MTgxODMwNzRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

**Contact Information**

For any questions related to this RFSO, please contact Carine Thibodeau (PSPC) at [carinethibodeau.quinn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:carinethibodeau.quinn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) or 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada.
